title: Provided that temporary construction for structures, etc
clause_text: Provided that temporary construction for structures, etc. mentioned at (iii), (iv), (vi), (ix), (x) and (xi) maybe permitted to be continued temporarily by the Commissioner but in any case, not beyond completion of construction of the main structure or building, and that structure in (viii) may be continued on annual renewable basis by the Commissioner beyond a period of three years.
